name: Ext_R5_MedicationRequest_informationSource
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.MedicationRequest.informationSource for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationRequest.informationSource from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationRequest|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: The person or organization who provided the information about this request, if the source is someone other than the requestor
element.definition: The person or organization who provided the information about this request, if the source is someone other than the requestor.  This is often used when the MedicationRequest is reported by another person.
element.comment: `MedicationRequest.informationSource` has no related element in R4B:MedicationRequest
